thread.title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
thread.title_full: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton

title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
text: > Sports A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton Formula 1 race car driver Lewis Hamilton talks to, from left, Ethan Scott, 14, Grant Bohlmann, 12, Travon Williams, 10, and Kaelyn Sanabria, 9, after he raced them in go karts at K1 Speed Indoor Kart Racing in Austin, Texas, on Wednesday Oct.21, 2015. Hamilton spent time with the children as part of a promotional appearance for Epson, a sponsor of Mercedes AMG Petronas Formual 1 team. (Jay Janner/Austin American-Statesman via AP) AUSTIN CHRONICLE OUT, COMMUNITY IMPACT OUT, INTERNET AND TV MUST CREDIT PHOTOGRAPHER AND STATESMAN.COM, MAGS OUT; MANDATORY CREDIT
